text: Wosang'hanika hana Ihanhu Hang'alile Ng'hani, aho kuli na mwigo na sisila da kija kili kuulanga. Kino kicho kilamso cha Musa kuzumigwa viyakalile behi na kudizenga dihema da kuiting'hanila, yolongeligwa, “Lola utende kila kinhu kamba vija vuulagusiligwe kuja kudigongo.”8:5 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha KUHALAWA 25:40.
